sub_title: 🚀 Progressive Entrepreneur | 📈 Business Strategist | 🌍💻 Language & Tech Lover
summary:
I'm a progressive entrepreneur and business strategist who's deeply fascinated by language and technology. My strength lies in tackling complex challenges and achieving tangible outcomes for clients, even when dealing with billion-dollar companies 💼💰.

Inspired by Alvin Toffler's powerful words about learning, I am committed to continuous self-improvement and staying ahead in my field. I believe in fostering strong connections with others and love to collaborate for mutual growth 🌱🤝.

Being a mentor is close to my heart, and I've had the privilege of helping thousands of individuals enhance their skills and knowledge. With my expertise, I can assist companies in reaching their business development goals, help individuals to communicate confidently in English anywhere, and master Microsoft Office programs with ease 💬💻.

I'm humbled by the numerous recommendations and positive feedback from satisfied clients, which reflect my dedication to delivering exceptional results. I'm eager to connect and explore new opportunities for growth together 💼🗣🚀.

Let's connect and explore potential opportunities to collaborate and grow our skills and experience together 🚀✨.

profile_positions.description: 🌟Unlock Your Language Dreams: Your Loyal Friend for Confident Communication! 💬🌐
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
I am developing sophisticated and successful experience in developing effective outreach tactics and advising the CEOs and founders of fantastic companies operating in a variety of industries.

One of my cases:
In June 2022, Sergey, CEO of a Ukrainian company, engaged me for business development/lead generation amid a severe decline in the local market due to the war. 
Together, we designed a comprehensive system encompassing Ideal Customer Profiles, detailed lead analysis, personalized outreach, CRM implementation, email marketing tools, and testing. 
The project yielded success, securing the first contract with a Polish company by November 2022. Subsequently, we established a partnership with a prominent European company generating substantial annual revenue. 
My skills in email marketing, communications, LinkedIn, sales, marketing, structural engineering, lead generation, and business development played a crucial role in achieving these results.
profile_positions.title: Director of Business Development

profile_positions.description: I manage a tiny blog and an online store for digital goods.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Director

profile_positions.title: IT Mentor

profile_positions.description:
Some of my former students feedbacks:

Anton:
"Learning English with David has become a real hobby. From the first days, David proved that he is a true professional with rich teaching experience. The training was easy and meaningful at the same time. David explains the theory very clearly, you can discuss any topic with him and feel support. I want to note the responsibility and involvement of David as a teacher, in addition, he uses a large number of his own materials for teaching. After starting to study with David, I no longer want to look for another teacher, because this is the highest level!"

Julia:
"Devid is really great teacher. We had English lessons twice a week for 6 months. During this period I improved my English and started to feel more confident on my working meetings. Devid is pretty structural and attentive teacher, he chooses the most interesting topics for student and makes big focus on practice. Also Devid has great sense of humor that I consider to be very important. Highly recommend for all who wants to speed up their learning of English with good and pleasant mentor."

Maria:
"David taught me English for about six months. It was a productive time for me. David was attentive for my weaknesses in language proficiency, and the lesson plan was made to my needs. David has motivational skills, flexibility and responsibility."
profile_positions.title: English Tutor
